[[Knock->Polite]]

[[Leave->Lost]]

passages.text:
//You start running uphill and you turn your head to see a tree fly towards the area you once were. You push yourself harder to run faster as you find a cave where the river is coming from. You rush in and are immediately overcome by darkness.//

[[Go deeper into the cave->Dark Death]]
[[Go to the side of the cave and hide behind the nearest rock->Hide and Seek 2]]
[[Turn back->Dumb Death]]

links.name: Go to the side of the cave and hide behind the nearest rock

Downstream

passages.text:
''Where are we? You tell me, where do you think we are?''

[[I'm not sure.->Answers 2]]
[[A forest!->Answers 2]]
[[A scary other dimension that\'s meant to kill me.->Answers 2]]

links.name: A scary other dimension that\'s meant to kill me.

passages.name: Answers
Hospitality
Escape

Soup Death

passages.text:
''No? But you haven't even tried it! And I worked so hard on it!''

//The old lady begins to cry.//

[[Apologize and take a sip->Soup Death]]
[[Say you've already eaten->Soup Death 2b]]
passages.name: Soup Death 2a
Soup Death 3
Soup Death 2b

passages.text:
//She laughs.//

''I'm assuming you want to go home. You can either trust in the woods or you can let me stop this nightmare.''

[[Trust in the woods->Woods]]
[[Let her stop the nightmare->Hospitality]]
passages.name: Answers 2
Woods

passages.text:
//You go towards the light and as you step out of the forest, your feet touch the familiar asphalt that is the road. The light is emitting from a small toll booth with two police officers in there.//

[[Run up to them->Psycho Ending]]
